槢字的基本解释

槢
xí
古书上说的一种树，木材坚硬。
起接合作用的木构件：“楯类腾蛇，槢似琼英。”

槢
dié
柃中栓。
槛下横木。

槢字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xí］
［《廣韻》似入切，入緝，邪。］
(1)坚木。
(2)引申为生硬。
(3)楔。指接合之木。

槢字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　槢； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页546第26
【唐韻】似入切【類篇】【韻會】席入切，?音習。【說文】木也。【徐曰】堅木。【元結·頌木魅辭】槢橈橈兮未堅。　又械也。【何晏·景福殿賦】楯類騰蛇，槢似瓊英。【註】械楔。

槢字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
槢字的起名意思

古书上说的一种树，木材坚硬。

槢
Basic explanation of words
槢
xí
A tree mentioned in ancient books, the wood is hard.
The wooden components that play the role of joining: "Snake like a snake, like Qiongying."
槢
dié
Yan Zhongshuan.
Crossbar under the threshold.
槢
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［xí］
["Guangyun" seems to be cut, entertaining, and evil. ]
(1) Hardwood.
(2) The extension is blunt.
(3) Wedge. Refers to the wood of joining.
槢
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji] [Wood Character Department] 　槢; Kangxi Strokes: 15; Page Number: Page 546 26
[Tang Yun] Appears to cut [Classes] [Rhyme Meeting] Xi to cut, sound learning. [Said the text] Mu Ye. [Xu Yue] Hardwood. [Yuan Jie·Song Mu Mei Ci] The shape and the radius are not firm.　It's another weapon. 【He Yan·Jingfu Palace Fu】Teng snakes in the arachnid category, and the shape is like Qiongying. [Note] Mechanical wedge.
槢

槢
Name meaning
A tree mentioned in ancient books, the wood is hard.
xí, dié
1) 古书上说的一种树，木材坚硬。
2) 起接合作用的木构件：“楯类腾蛇，～似琼英。”
